name: Pixel Car P.O.V. Simulator (Prototype)
description:
Drive an Arthuro T8 on a straight line. This project, for the most part, has a very unknown fate, so let me know what you guys think of this. Is there any other details I should add? (I know car people must have a lot of suggestions that I should add ;) ) There's definitely rough edges in this prototype but yea, again, please let me know what y'all think about it hahaha

Controls:

Up Arrow - Accelerate

Down Arrow - Brake

Left/Right Arrow - Turn Left/Right

Z - Shift Up

X - Shift Down

Additional Note: If it runs like crud, try using a different browser. I noticed that it runs significantly better in Microsoft Edge than in Google Chrome, but that's probably only on my end.
